description: This file defines a fragment called EpgFragment for an Android app, which displays electronic program guide (EPG) information including channels and their programs. It uses RecyclerViews for listing channels and programs, with adapters and view holders for rendering. It manages user interactions such as channel selection, playing programs, and toggling favorites.

classes.name: EpgFragment
classes.description: Main fragment displaying the EPG with channel and program lists, handling user interactions.

classes.name: ChannelAdapter
classes.description: RecyclerView adapter for displaying channel list with selection handling.

classes.name: ChannelViewHolder
classes.description: View holder for a single channel item.

classes.name: ProgramAdapter
classes.description: RecyclerView adapter for displaying program items.

classes.name: ProgramViewHolder
classes.description: View holder for a single program item, handles UI binding and click actions.

methods.name: onViewCreated
methods.description: Initializes the view, sets up RecyclerViews, adapters, and default selections.

methods.name: renderPrograms
methods.description: Filters and displays programs for the selected channel, handling play and favorite toggle actions.

methods.name: newInstance
methods.description: Creates a new instance of EpgFragment.

methods.name: bind
methods.description: Binds channel data to its view holder, indicating selection.

methods.name: onCreateViewHolder
methods.description: Inflates layout and creates a ViewHolder for channels or programs.

methods.name: onBindViewHolder
methods.description: Binds data to a ViewHolder and sets up click and focus listeners.

methods.name: getItemCount
methods.description: Returns the total number of items in the adapter.

methods.name: bind
methods.description: Binds program data to its view holder, setting click actions for play and favorites.
